title: Bar Briyut
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, International, Salad bar, Take-out, Middle Eastern, Israeli, Kosher, Non-veg
description: Serves fish, veg options available. Home-style restaurant, gets crowded at lunch from the surrounding office and blue collar business employees. Vegans could get from the salad bar plus soup, stews, stir-fries, grains, Moroccan hummus, legumes, curries, and other food.
